episodes.title: Links 2/21/2026
episodes.description: Daily Links from Naked Capitalism. 11 articles: Dog trained to illegally dump rubbish, Italian authorities say; The Cult Deprogrammer Who Needed Deprogramming; Biology’s New Era: The historic shift from studying life to engineering it; Plastic surgeon pumps more drama into ‘PenisGate’ at Olympics with injection claim; The latest skincare fad is rubbing salmon sperm on your face…
